item.title: Object teleport
item.dc:creator: @omg_ffs_ownd omg ffs ownd

umm all you did was take out the update char booleans and added in the teleblock checker[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 09, 2008, 11:32:06 PM[/size][hr]anybody else please? seriously please someone other than this guy…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 09, 2008, 11:45:35 PM[/size][hr]plus i didn’t even want it to check for teleblock…

anyone else see any issues i need to fix?

item.title: Object teleport
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

[code]case 2469:
if(!teleblock)
{

teleportToX = 2660;
teleportToY = 3305;
sendMessage(“test confirmed”);
}
else if(teleblock)
{
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}

break;[/code]

Try that, it’ll also stop them from teleporting if teleblocked.

Read full topic

item.title: Object teleport
item.dc:creator: @omg_ffs_ownd omg ffs ownd
item.description:
@omg_ffs_ownd wrote:

i am having issues with creating objects and having them teleport you.

i created the object and made the case for it

in this case i did:

case 2469: { teleportToX = 2660; teleportToY = 3305; sendMessage("test confirmed"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break;
wtf is wrong with it?

Read full topic
